general.title: General Settings
general.includeCoAuthoredByDesc: Add Claude attribution to git commits and pull requests
general.verboseDesc: Show full bash and command outputs
general.cleanupPeriodDesc: How long to retain chat transcripts locally (default: 30 days)
general.claudeInstallationDesc: Select which Claude Code installation to use. Bundled version is recommended for best compatibility.
general.binaryPathChanged: ⚠️ Claude binary path has been changed. Remember to save your settings.

permissions.title: Permission Rules
permissions.description: Control which tools Claude Code can use without manual approval
permissions.noAllowRules: No allow rules configured. Claude will ask for approval for all tools.
permissions.exampleEdit: Allow editing files in docs directory

environment.description: Environment variables applied to every Claude Code session

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Additional configuration options for advanced users
advanced.apiKeyHelperDesc: Custom script to generate auth values for API requests
advanced.rawSettingsDesc: This shows the raw JSON that will be saved to ~/.claude/settings.json

hooks.title: User Hooks
hooks.description: Configure hooks that apply to all Claude Code sessions for your user account. These are stored in ~/.claude/settings.json

claudeVersionSelector.title: Claude Code Installation
claudeVersionSelector.description: Choose your preferred Claude Code installation. Bundled version is recommended for best compatibility.

storageTab.title: Database Storage
storageTab.updateRowDescription: Update the values for this row in the {{table}} table.
storageTab.addRowDescription: Add a new row to the {{table}} table.
storageTab.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this row? This action cannot be undone.
storageTab.resetDescription: This will delete all data and recreate the database with its default structure (empty tables for agents, agent_runs, and app_settings). The database will be restored to the same state as when you first installed the app. This action cannot be undone.
storageTab.resetWarning: All your agents, runs, and settings will be permanently deleted!
storageTab.sqlQueryDescription: Execute raw SQL queries on the database. Use with caution.
storageTab.resetComplete: Database Reset Complete: The database has been restored to its default state with empty tables (agents, agent_runs, app_settings).
storageTab.resetFailed: Reset Failed: Failed to reset the database. Please try again.

events.preToolUseDesc: Runs before tool calls, can block and provide feedback
events.notificationDesc: Customizes notifications when Claude needs attention
events.subagentStopDesc: Runs when a Claude subagent (Task) finishes

hooksEditor.patternTooltip: Tool name pattern (regex supported). Leave empty to match all tools.
hooksEditor.noHooks: No hooks configured for this event
hooksEditor.templatesDescription: Choose a pre-configured hook template to get started quickly

slashCommandsManager.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The command file will be permanently deleted.
